thread.title: North Korea Nuclear Talks: Breakthroughs, Disappointments

author: Jonathan Cheng
title: North Korea Nuclear Talks: Breakthroughs, Disappointments
text:
For nearly a quarter of a century, the U.S. has resorted to a combination of carrots and sticks to deter North Korea from developing a nuclear bomb, to no avail.
The effort to turn back the clock on Pyongyangâ€™s weapons program is entering a new and unpredictable period, after President Donald Trump accepted an invitation Thursday to meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.
The... RELATED VIDEO In a historic diplomatic breakthrough, President Donald Trump accepted an invitation from North Korean leader Kim Jong Un to meet "as soon as possible." News of the summit was announced by a senior South Korean official at the White House Thursday evening.
